Full-time Developer Job at Guufs International Limited




        
    

        
        Guufs International Limited is a global technology company, focused on building digital publishing platforms and providing tech and marketing consulting services. With a strong emphasis on innovation, the company delivers insightful content on AI, digital tools, and business growth, while also helping creators and businesses develop smart digital strategies. Through a remote-first approach and a commitment to empowering entrepreneurs, Guufs International Limited connects people with the technologies and ideas they need to succeed in today’s digital world.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are building something bold: a global platform at the intersection of AI, creators, and entrepreneurship. Right now, it’s an MVP. The vision? A creator-first hub where millions worldwide discover tools, tutorials, and playbooks to turn ideas into income. We are small, scrappy, and ambitious, and we are looking for someone just as hungry to grow with us.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Full-time Developer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are hiring developers who can take us from MVP to a product that scales globally.
	This isn’t a 9–5 role. This is a front-row seat at a startup where your work will directly shape the future. You’ willgrow our tech, deliver features that create real value, and grow as fast as we do.
	If you’ve ever dreamed of building something that matters from the ground up, this is your chance.


Responsibilities


	Take ownership of in-house tech projects, the roadmap, and our client projects.
	Build and launch new AI-driven features fast: search, personalisation, integrations, and community systems.
	Scale us from MVP to a full-fledged platform.
	Use a mix of code and no-code to move quickly.
	Ensure the product is simple, fast, and loved by our target audience
	Work hand in hand with the founding team on product strategy.


Requirements


	Hungry for success: You want more than a pay cheque; you want to help shape something big.
	Ambitious: You are not afraid of responsibility and love building.
	Startup-minded: You thrive in lean, fast-paced environments.
	Skilled in web development (including WordPress, Webflow, or Next.js) and comfortable with AI and AI APIs.
	Understand value delivery with tech: you care about outcomes, not just code.
	Curious, adaptable, and driven by impact.


Salary
N100,000 per month. 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume, Cover Letter and Links to their Portfolio / GitHub / Projects. to: careers@guufsinternational.com using "Developer - [Your Name]" as the subject of the mail.

Note: This is not a job. It’s an opportunity to build a legacy at an early-stage startup.
